Breadth-First.Explanation: General statement of intent to gather clues without a specific hypothesis, indicating broad exploratory mode.
Descriptive listing of man-made object clues, broad observation to collect information.
Descriptive listing of natural elements, continuing broad clue collection.

Depth-First.Explanation: Convergent analysis focusing on the street sign clue to form and verify a specific location hypothesis.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Street sign 'LOGIC LANE' with blue background and white text

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shift from broad clue collection to focused hypothesis generation and verification based on the distinctive street sign clue.
